title: CRASH
body: I was in a ranked and after a decend time my lol game crashed and he was updating an big update while im in a ranked game so after 15 mins it was finished and i lost gg rito

replies.body:
It sounds like your game ran across some type of corrupted file and wasn't able to recover from it. When it started 'updating' the patcher was probably scanning your files to see what needed to be repaired. It sucks that this happened during a ranked game, but now that your client has been repaired you should be good to go. 

Check out our [**Crash Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) for some other things you can double check to make sure your game will run properly.
